Html:
Where do you have to apply if you want to help out when you'll accept input from the community?
You can always contact me on Twitter (@TomKerkhove) or www.kinectingforwindows.com

Shall I call you Tom or HellScreammm? :-)

We will let folks know here on CodePlex when we start accepting contributions from the community. In the mean time please do continue to use the discussions area here to raise feedback & questions. Also, the issue tracker can be used to report bugs.

Ben
